plot: Who wouldn't want an other self who can achieve the impossible? What if all you have to do is look in a mirror? The boundaries between reality and fantasy are blurred in this unusual comedy in which nothing is what it seems.
title: Cuando Apolo encontró a Dionisos
plot_es: Who wouldn't want an other self who can achieve the impossible? What if all you have to do is look in a mirror? The boundaries between reality and fantasy are blurred in this unusual comedy in which nothing is what it seems.
plot_en: Who wouldn't want an other self who can achieve the impossible? What if all you have to do is look in a mirror? The boundaries between reality and fantasy are blurred in this unusual comedy in which nothing is what it seems.
